cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

#Automatically generated from files in this directory.
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/append.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/as_single.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/as_tuple.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/awaitable_operators.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_channel.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_concurrent_channel.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/cancellation_condition.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/channel.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/channel_error.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/channel_traits.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/concurrent_channel.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/coro.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/coro_traits.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/co_spawn.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/deferred.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/parallel_group.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/prepend.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/promise.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/use_coro.hpp")

#Automatically generated from subdirectories in this directory.
add_subdirectory("detail")
add_subdirectory("impl")
